content: US HHS/Office of the National Coordinator released the Draft US Core Data for Interoperability yesterday. You can see the webpage at https://www.healthit.gov/isa/united-states-core-data-interoperability-uscdi or directly to the Draft USCDI v2 at https://www.healthit.gov/isa/sites/isa/files/2021-01/Draft-USCDI-Version-2-January-2021-Final.pdf
